title: 20th Century Advertising (Art Design Ebook).pdf
description:
Twentieth-century Advertising
Author: Dave Saunders | Publisher: Carlton Books | 1999 | Language: English | ISBN: 1858685206 | 256 Pages | PDF | 102 Mb


Advertising today is the most inescapable spectacle of all forms of modern mass communications. This book explores how the greatest campaigns of the 20th century have come to occupy a unique cultural position in the economic, social, political and aesthetic spheres of everyday life.
